title: $5,000 Reward Offered for an introduction which leads to a T214 Victory Cobb Sale
author: Blunder19

posts.post_title: $5,000 Reward Offered for an introduction which leads to a T214 Victory Cobb Sale
posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone... I am trying to find the current owner of the below T214 Victory Red Cobb

I am offering a $5,000 reward as a referral fee, to anyone who introduces me to the owner of the below pictured T214 Victory.. the one caveat.. it must lead to a sale... the $5,000 will be sent via Paypal gift once the card is in hand...

Here is a picture of the card I am searching for.. it was last known to be owned by Jim Blumenthal before he passed.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/xR5MDdl.jpg[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/bboBAoY.jpg[/img]

Should you know the owner please contact me at [url]blunder19@aol.com[/url]

Jaime, if you're offering that kind of finder's fee, how much do you expect to pay for the card itself?

I'm not really expecting an answer.   :D
